sentences.english: Some physiological indices of Rana plancyi plancyi were tested before and after hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 实验测定了金线蛙冬眠前后几项生理指标。

sentences.english: Vitamin injections in any case do not help tortoises to survive hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 维生素注射在任何情况下对龟龟冬眠是没有帮助的。

sentences.english: Who needs rest? A couple of bears who'll beat the other bears to Crowberry Ridge.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经冬眠了六个月了，谁需要休息啊？

sentences.english: Unseasonal rains can make animals come out of hibernation too early.
sentences.chinese: 非季节性的雨会导致动物提前出冬眠。

sentences.english: Pikas get a rude awakening from their long hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 鼠兔在漫长的冬眠后被粗鲁的唤醒。

sentences.english: This state is called hibernating myocardium.
sentences.chinese: 这种状态叫做冬眠心肌。

sentences.english: A bear have to hibernate (long time sleeping) during cold winter, in purpose to save her energy and life.
sentences.chinese: 熊冬季必须冬眠，为了储存能量和生命。

sentences.english: This humidity causes the eggs to come out of dormancy and begin developing.
sentences.chinese: 这湿度也使了蛹结束冬眠，开始孵化。

sentences.english: Another hibernating creature is the bear.
sentences.chinese: 另一个冬眠的动物是熊。

sentences.english: What I’m talking about here is hibernation.
sentences.chinese: 现在我要在这里聊的就是冬眠。

sentences.english: All animals are smothered in their lairs.
sentences.chinese: 所有的小生灵都躲在巢穴里冬眠。

sentences.english: One of the most interesting characteristics of bears , including the black bear , is their winter sleep.
sentences.chinese: 熊类，包括黑熊的最有趣的一个特点是他们的冬眠。

sentences.english: After hibernating for months, they are itching for action.
sentences.chinese: 在冬眠了几个月之后，他们开始手痒想行动。

sentences.english: I love you as the waking bear loves the smell of spring.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你，就像从冬眠中醒来的小熊爱嗅到春天的气息。

sentences.english: Some animals only half-hibernate, that is to say, their sleep is not such a deep one.
sentences.chinese: 有些动物只是半冬眠，就是说它们睡的不那么深沉。

definition: to forage/to hunt for food/to scavenge/fig. to make a living
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
to freeze to death/to die off in winter
to freeze over/to ice over/icebound/to shelve (a proposal etc)
